name: emiT
description:
You are stuck in a 5 second long loop! HOWEVER, you can go back in time to fix your mistkes. Use this mechanic to solve 10 increasingly difficult puzzles.

-- CONTROLS --

"W" - jump

"A" and "D" - move left and right

Arrow keys - control the 5 second time loop

"E" - skip level

"Q" - go to previous level

Made for Ludum Dare 47, theme: Stuck in a loop

Code: Me

Art: Me

Music: Fran Karlović

Sound Effects: Me, Fran Karlović

Level design: Fran Karlović
